title: EYL #152 Entrepreneur turned 97 No’s into a Million Dollar Empire
itunes:title: EYL #152 Entrepreneur turned 97 No’s into a Million Dollar Empire
description:
Ryan Wilson is the CEO of the world-famous The Gathering Spot which are private membership social clubs in Atlanta and DC, with a location in LA coming soon. 


He is also the CEO of A3C Festival, which is one of the largest festivals to combine culture, business, and music. 


Ryan told us his journey in starting The Gathering Spot. He explained the hurdles in raising capital, how he has survived during COVID-19, he spoke about how to get celebrity backers, the ins and outs of running a festival, and more. #atlanta #business #entrepreneur 


EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com


Host IG: https://instagram.com/bankgreenwood?utm_medium=copy_link


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/spotonrw?utm_medium=copy_link

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
